shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 3r-141ra) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 3r-62r; 63r-110r) I-2) Mäḫalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 110v-121r) I-3) Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 121r-126v) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “The Praise of Mary” (fols. 127ra-136vb) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 136vb-141ra)
Additiones 1-4.

donors.donor: The names of Wälättä Muse, Wäldä Śǝllase and rarely Täklä ʾƎgziʾ are crudely written, possibly in the same hand as Additio 2, in black, beside the ornamental bands on e.g., fols. 3r, 56v, 105r.

txstates.txstate: Many leaves are damaged by water and stained with dirt.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: single line fillet, single circle, corni form, double sine wave with dots, x-form, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

txfolios.txfolio: Foliation mistake; fol. 91 has been numbered 100, this numbering continues up to the end of the Ms.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(10/fols. 3r-12v) – ፪II(10/fols. 13r-22v) – ፫III(10/fols. 23r-32v) – ፬IV(12/fols. 33r-44v) – ፭V(10/fols. 45r-54v) – ፮VI(10/fols. 55r-64v) – ፯VII(10/fols. 65r-74v) – ፰VIII(10/fols. 75r-84v) – ፱IX(10/fols. 85r-103v) – ፲X(10/fols. fols. 104r-113v) – ፲፩XI(10/fols. 114r-123v) – ፲፪XII(10/fols. 124r-133v) – ፲፫XIII(10/fols. 134r-143v).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 4r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are mostly visible (s. fol. 27r). The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 128r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

ptypeofscripts.ptypeofscript: Late 19th - first half of the 20th century

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra (name of God in Text I-1; name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); incipit of the inscription on fol. 3r; titles and numbers of the Pss. and Canticles; incipits and numbers of Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name, number and traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; abbreviation እስ፡ in Ps. 135; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; letters ይ, ር and ዎ in the word ይባርክዎ in Canticle 10; abbreviation ስቡ᎓ in Canticle 10; abbreviations of refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A few groups of lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of Texts I-1 to I-4.

abbreviations.abbreviation: እስ፡ for እስመ፡ ለዓለም፡ ምሕረቱ፡ (Ps. 135, fols. 101v-102r) ስቡ᎓ for ስቡሕኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ወልዑልኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ (Canticle 10, fols. 117v-118r) Text I-4 ሰ፡ ለ፡ ቅ፡ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት Words or their abbreviations stand for the whole refrain: ሠ፡ for ሠረቀ፡ በሥጋ፡ እምድንግል፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ዘርአ፡ ብእሲ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fol. 127rb-vb) እስ፡ for እስመ፡ በፈቃዱ፡ ወበሥምረቱ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መጽአ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 128rb-129va) ኵ፡/ኵሉ፡ for ኵሉ፡ ትውልድ፡ ያስተበፅዑኪ፡ ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ (fols. 129vb-130ra) ወበ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 132ra-133rb) ለ፡/ለኪ፡ for ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ እመ፡ ብርሃን፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ በስብሐት፡ ወበውዳሴ (fols. 133va-134ra) ተ፡/ተፈ፡ for ተፈሥሒ፡ ኦምልዕልተ፡ ጸጋ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ሞገስ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ (fol. 135ra-va) ወበ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fol. 136ra-vb) Text I-5 ሰ፡ ለ፡ ቅ፡ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት በእ፡ for በእንተ፡ ወ፤ ሣ፤ ይ፤ ሰ፤ ቅ፤ for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፍለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት The abbreviations stand for the whole refrain: ወ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ

otherdetails.otherdetail: Ps. 1 is preceded by a verse from Mäzmurä dǝngǝl (for an Italian translation s. O. RAINERI (tr.), Salmi etiopici di Cristo e della Vergine, Roma 2005, 133).

additional.cont: Fol. 2r-v: Sälam-hymn for the Archangel Fanuˀel.
Fol. 62v: Protective prayer containing ˀasmat.
additional.det: Text at page bottom poorly legible.

additional.cont: Fol. 110r: Note on the end of the Psalms of Dawid.
additional.det: The note is hardly legible due to faded ink. The name of the supplicant has been erased.

additional.cont: Fol. 141ra-rb: Note on calendar.
additional.det: In Amharic. Beginning of the text has been erased.

additional.cont: Fol. 141v: Purchase note.
additional.det: The note is crudely written in Amharic and dated to 1927 year of mercy (= 1934/35 A.D.).

extras.extra: - Title of the work, ዳዊት, is written on the front board, in black paint. - The Pss. are divided into groups of ten separated by coloured ornamental bands, mostly rather crudely drawn, with varying filler motifs. - The midpoint of the “Psalms of David” (in Ps. 77) is marked on fol. 52r with a coloured (red, black) drawing of a cross and an inscription inside: መንፈቁ፡. - Part of the line is taken up: e.g., fols. 6v, 11v, 14v, 34v, 37r, 54r, 76r, 119r, 126v. - Part of the line is taken down: e.g., fols. 22v, 26v, 27r, 43v, 46r. - Tämälläs-sign, in the shape of a cross, indicating the place where the omissions, written in the upper margin, belong: fols. 113r l.16, 140va l.17. - Omitted letters, words, lines or passages written interlineally, in the main hand and in a secondary hand: fols. 7v, 20r, 25r, 29r, 33r, 42r, 47r, 58r, 64v, 83r, 100r, 111r, 112r, 122r. - At least two notes have been erased form fol. 141rab.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Decorated quire marks are written in the left upper margin of fols. 13r, 23r, 33r, 45r, 55r, 65r, 75r, 85r, 104r, 114r, 124r, 134r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Coloured threads are inserted in the right upper corner of fols. 35, 39, 47, 56, 68, 78, 88, 105.

frames.frame: Fols. 8v, 14v, 20v, 28v, 35r, 39v, 56v, 63v, 68r, 88r, 90v, 105r, 110v, 121r; 47r, 78v (in the incipit pages of the Psalms, Canticles and Song of Songs, and separating each ten psalm group): elaborate coloured (red, yellow, blue) ornamental bands; interlaces, floral and geometrical motifs; anthropomorphic motifs (eyes).
